remarks: Show that the original axiom ~ ax-c10 can be derived from ~ ax6 and others.  See ~ ax6fromc10 for the rederivation of ~ ax6 from ~ ax-c10 . Normally, ~ axc10 should be used rather than ~ ax-c10 , except by theorems specifically studying the latter's properties.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: axc10 $p |- ( A. x ( x = y -> A. x ph ) -> ph ) $.
